item.title: Report X-2025030099
item.description:
Report X-2025030099

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-05T18:18:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-25
  • City: MAPLE GROVE
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A HAZMAT AUDITOR CAME BY AND SAID A HAZMAT ON HIS TRAM WAS LEAKING. THEY POINTED AT A PACKAGE WITH BOTH CLASS 5.1 AND 8 HAZARD DIAMONDS AND WAS LEAKING A SMALL SMOUNT OF LIQUID FROM ONE CORNER. FURTHER INSPECTION SHOWED THE PACKAGE CONTAINED 4 1GAL CONTAINERS WITH VENTED CAPS AND 1 HAD A VERY LOOSE CAP.

item.title: Report X-2025030098
item.description:
Report X-2025030098

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-05T18:18:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-25
  • City: MINNEAPOLIS
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO THE DMP BY THE RESPONDER ON 2/25/24 AT 12:20 AM. THE PACKAGE CAME FROM THE RED SECONDARY. IN THE DMP, PACKAGE WAS OPENED AND FOUND TO CONTAIN FOUR, 1 GALLON, PLASTIC JUGS OF MINNCARE HD DISINFECTANT, BEING SHIPPED AS A OXIDIZER/CORROSIVE HAZMAT PACKAGE, (UN3149, HYDROGEN PEROXIDE AND PEROXYACETIC ACID MIXTURES, STABILIZED, 5,1(8), II, 1 FIBERBOARD BOX X 4 GALLON). THE CAP ON ONE OF THE FOUR PLASTIC BOTTLES, WAS LOOSE, WHIGH ALLOWED ABOUT, 1/2 GALLON OF THE MIXTURE, TO LEAK ONTO ALL INNER JUGS, PLUS THE OUTSIDE CARTON. 4 OTHER PACKAGES WERE ALSO STAINED BY THE MIXTURE ON THE SLIDE. THE HAZMAT PACKAGE, WERE PROCESSED THROUGH THE DMP.

item.title: Report X-2025030073
item.description:
Report X-2025030073

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-05T18:18:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-24
  • City: MAPLE GROVE
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS NOTIFIED ABOUT A LEAKING HAZMAT AT THE L5 LOAD WALL. ARRIVING AT THE LOAD WALL, WAS POINTED TO A PACKAGE WITH BOTH 5.1 AND 8 HAZARDOUS DIAMONDS THAT WAS LEAKING A SMALL AMOUNT OF LIQUID FROM THE BOTTOM CORNER OF THE PACKAGE. BRINGING THE PACKAGE BACK TO THE DMP RESPONDER FOUND 4 1GAL CONTAINERS WITH VENTED CAPS, 1 WITH A VERY LOOSE CAP WHICH ALLOWED THE CONTENTS TO LEAK.
